msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; the name of the protagonist and other saints (e.g. fols. 3va, 6rb, 8va, 13va, etc.); the name of the owner and members of his family (e.g., fols. 24va, 32va, 35rb); a few lines alternating with black lines on the incipit page of Texts I (fol. 3r), II (fol. 28rb), III (fol. 36r); incipit of the subsections in Texts I and II; the word sälam “salutation” and its abbreviation in Text III; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

msItem.note: - Text I has been edited by G. LUSINI, “Il Gadla Ananya”, Egitto e Vicino Oriente 13, 1990, 149-91, and by O. RAINERI, “Atti di Anania, santo monaco etiopico del XVI secolo”, Ephemerides Liturgicae 104, 1990, 65-91.
Text II has been edited by G. LUSINI, “Miracoli di Ananya”, Egitto e Vicino Oriente 14, 1991-92, 171-74.
Text III has been edited by by O. RAINERI, “Il testo etiopico dell’«Effigie di Anania»”, Quaderni Utinensi 7 [13/14], 1989 [1993], 165-66.

Fol. 39vb: Ownership note.Fol. 39vb: ዝመዝሐፍ[sic]፡ ዘልጅ፡ ገብረ፡ ኪዳን፡ ወአቡሁ፡ ገብረ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወእሙ፡ ወለተ፡ ማርያም፡ ወአኃዊሁ፡ ገብረ፡ ማርያም፡ ፍሬ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ገብረ፡ መስቀል፡ ገብረ፡ ስላሴ፡ ወለተ፡ ሥላሴ፡ አመተ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወለተ፡ መድኅን፡ ከመ፡ ይኲኖሙ፡ መርኃ፡ በምንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት። ለዓለም፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን።
The note mentions lǝǧ Gäbrä Kidan as the owner. Other members of his family are also mentioned: his father Gäbrä Mikaʾel, his mother Wälättä Maryam, his brothers and sisters Gäbrä Maryam, Fǝre Qǝddus, Gäbrä Mäsqäl, Gäbrä Sǝllase, Wälättä Ṥǝllase, ʾAmätä Mikaʾel and Wälättä Mädḫǝn.

- Two notes written in a recent hand mention lǝǧ Gäbrä Kidan as the donor of the Ms. to the church of Qǝddus Yoḥannǝs Mäṭmǝq (spelled "Kokolo" on fol. 40v): fols. 40r, 40v. - Omitted letters written interlineally: fols. 7vb, 28rb, 31ra, 32va, 39rb, 39va. - Corrections written over erased words and passages: fol. 27vb. - Erasures: fol. 39rb. - Immediate corrections: repeated words or letters encircled with black and red dots or crossed out in red ink, fols. 7ra, 11ra, 12vb, 16ra. - Tämälläs-sign, in the shape of a cross, indicating the place where an omitted word, written in the upper margin, belongs: fol. 39vb. - Tämälläs-sign, in the shape of two perpendicular lines, indicating the place where an omitted word, written in the upper margin, belongs: fol. 10vb (the omitted word is marked with a decorative design), 39rb. - Crude doodles of crosses, in recent hand, in a blue pen: fols. 1v, 2r, 40v. - Minor writings and scribbles in a blue pen: fols. 1r, 2v, 2r, 40v. - Pen trial: fols. 1r, 3r, 40v.

person.persName: Lǝǧ Gäbrä Kidan is mentioned as the owner in Additio 1 with other members of his family. Their names also appear in the supplication formulas e.g., fols. 4rb, 11va, 28vb, 34ra, 35v. The name of a different person Gäbrä Śǝllase is written in a recent hand, in strong red ink, on fols. 27vb, 28va; his name is also crudely written on fols.1r, 2r, 40v.
